rules.specification: class with function with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.messaging.Outgoing" or annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.messaging.Incoming" must have annotation "javax.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped" or annotation "javax.enterprise.context.Dependent"
field with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client.inject.RestClient" must have annotation "javax.inject.Inject"
field with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.jwt.Claim" must have annotation "javax.inject.Inject"
field with type "org.eclipse.microprofile.jwt.JsonWebToken" must have annotation "javax.inject.Inject"

class with function with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.graphql.Query" or annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.graphql.Mutation" must have annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.graphql.GraphQLApi"
class with function with parameter with annotation "javax.ws.rs.PathParam" must have annotation "javax.ws.rs.Path" or function with annotation "javax.ws.rs.Path"
field with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.config.inject.ConfigProperty" must have annotation "javax.inject.Inject"
